Summary: Oblong aerial object with no motor sound, only rush of wind, made 90 degree maneuvers and ejected flame-like material
divs: sighting detailsfebruary 21, 1967. two weeks ago had observed ufo\uao with 4 friends. it was just beginning to get dark. there was still light in the sky but i believe the sun had already set. three of us were walking to the edge of the campus where our p.o. boxes and a dairy queen were located. bob had been one of the 5 in the car at the previous sighting. he was with me and another guy and i was re-telling the tale to this third guy, using bob as a witness. we were standing at a traffic light across the street from a store on the opposite corner and i was right in the middle of talking about the other ufo we had encountered. behind the store was a small stand of trees. directly across the crosswalk on that corner was a similar stand of trees. behind those, less than 50 feet away, was the large parking area that had the post office and dq. there was a sudden rush of wind. the noise of wind came from the left. we could clearly see a maybe 40 foot long "craft" of some kind whooshing by at what was maybe 40-50 miles per hour, above and behind the corner store and behind, but not higher than, the stand of trees. from our viewpoint, it looked like an airplane but there was no engine sound, only the rush of wind, and what sounded like something metal flapping against something metal. there were sections of light on the side we could see that did not look like running lights, but gave the impression of a row of windows with the visible light coming from within. given what had happened with a previous sighting 2 weeks earlier, i was sure this was another unconventional aircraft. i ran across the street past the trees and into the open parking area and stood directly behind the path of this thing as it moved away. the parking area bordered a large field that had few trees and the thing was now moving over it. one of the other guys reached the parking area and was behind me. from this perspective, all we could see was a a dark object with no wings moving away from us in a straight line. just as quickly, this object appeared to suddenly move up 90 degrees for a second, then made a 180 degree turn to the same path it had been on, turned 90 degrees again and continued to move straight away from us. it seemed to be like a cartoon, because not even a toy can perform such a maneuver. it repeated this same maneuver twice more, until it was too far away to be visible. each of the 3 times it did that, bits of light that looked like flames shot out of it and sprinkled down on its downturn, but faded before they got to the ground. this sighting created more frustration for me because my two companions seemed to act as if this was a common occurance. also, there were other people in the parking lot of the dq who apparently hadn't noticed what had just whisked by overhead. still i had a feeling of elation about what had happened in these 2 weeks, that with the increase in sightings by me and by others around the world, that maybe something big was going to happen, that some "contact" will be formally and publicly established, that our world may be on the edge of a really new frontier.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Statesboro
There were no other sightings in Statesboro on or around February 21st 1967
